channel.title: Npc Prayer
channel.description: Ok, ive added full slayer to my server, but the only problem is, when you put prayer on, the npcs hit right through the prayer, it would make it nearly impossible to do slayer because most of the monsters hit 10+ EVERY HIT. so can someone teach me how to add prayer against npcs? i will rep++

now would that be in player.java or in the prayer.java?
